instructions.en: Turn left to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Cruce a laizquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Cruce a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner à gauche pour rester Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Gira a sinistra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Vire à esquerda para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sol yöne dön
instructions.vi: Quẹo trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
